mapper.select: SELECT ingredient_stock_name, ingredient_stock_total_cost, ingredient_stock_bought_at, ingredient_stock_category, CONCAT(ingredient_stock_total_quantity, ingredient_stock_unit) AS quantity_unit FROM ingredient_stock WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND DATE_FORMAT(ingredient_stock_bought_at, '%Y-%m') = #{monthlyPurchaseRequest.chosenMonth} ORDER BY ingredient_stock_bought_at DESC
SELECT ingredient_stock_name, SUM(ingredient_stock_total_cost) AS total_cost FROM ingredient_stock WHERE user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY ingredient_stock_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC

SELECT ingredient_stock_category, COALESCE(SUM(ingredient_stock_total_cost), 0) AS total_cost FROM ingredient_stock WHERE user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY ingredient_stock_category ORDER BY total_cost DESC

SELECT temp.month_date AS stat_month, SUM(temp.buy_amount) AS total_cost, SUM(temp.waste_amount) AS discard_cost, CASE WHEN SUM(temp.buy_amount) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM(temp.waste_amount) / SUM(temp.buy_amount)) * 100, 2) END AS waste_rate FROM (
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ingredient_stock_bought_at, '%Y-%m') AS month_date, ingredient_stock_total_cost AS buy_amount, 0 AS waste_amount FROM ingredient_stock WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND ingredient_stock_bought_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(disposal_at, '%Y-%m') AS month_date, 0 AS buy_amount, disposal_cost AS waste_amount FROM disposal_histories WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND disposal_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) ) temp GROUP BY temp.month_date ORDER BY temp.month_date ASC
